evidence.source_document: Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause
evidence.text: Filed 06/05/25 ... Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause ... Plaintiffs will move the Court pursuant to Rule 65 ... for a temporary restraining order ... Enjoin Federal Defendant Agencies ... from taking any actions to implement or enforce ... the unlawful directives ...

extracted.value: Filed by plaintiffs (represented by Farella Braun + Martel LLP, etc.) on June 5, 2025, the Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause requests that the federal defendants and their agencies be enjoined from implementing or enforcing the Trump and DOGE directives that unlawfully terminate federal research grants, and seeks a temporary restraining order to preserve the status of those grants, restoration of previously awarded grants, and no‑cost extensions for plaintiffs and the proposed class.

evidence.source_document: Motion for Preliminary Injunction and Provisional Class Certification as to Additional Agency Defendants
Motion for Preliminary Injunction and Provisional Class Certification as to Additional Agency Defendants
evidence.text: "MOTION FOR PRELIMINARY INJUNCTION AND PROVISIONAL CLASS CERTIFICATION AS TO ADDITIONAL AGENCY DEFENDANTS"

extracted.value: Filed by plaintiffs Erwin Chemerinsky and Claudia Polsky on 08/01/2025, requesting a preliminary injunction and provisional class certification against additional agency defendants.

evidence.text: "Motion for Partial Stay Pending Appeal Relief Requested by August 4, 2025"

extracted.value: Filed by plaintiffs Neeta Thakur, Ken Alex, Eli Berman, Susan Handy, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, and Jedda Foreman on 07/11/2025, seeking a partial stay pending appeal relief.

evidence.source_document: Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause
Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause
evidence.text: "EX PARTE APPLICATION / MOTION FOR TEMPORARY RESTRAINING ORDER"

extracted.value: Filed by plaintiffs Erwin Chemerinsky and Claudia Polsky on 06/05/2025, requesting a temporary restraining order and an order to show cause to halt NSF grant terminations.

evidence.source_document: Plaintiffs' Motion for Class Certification and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support
Plaintiffs' Motion for Class Certification and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support
evidence.text: Plaintiffs’ Motion for Class Certification and Memorandum of Points and Authorities in Support

extracted.value: Filed by plaintiffs Erwin Chemerinsky and Claudia Polsky on 06/05/25, seeking class certification and supporting memorandum of points and authorities.

evidence.text: 18 | 2025-06-05 | MOTION to Certify Class filed by Neeta Thakur, Ken Alex, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, Jedda Foreman. Responses due by 6/20/2025. Replies due by 6/27/2025. (Attachments: # 1 Declaration of E. Cabraser ISO Class Certification Motion, # 2 Proposed Order Granting Class Certification and Appointing Class Counsel)(Cabraser, Elizabeth) (Filed on 6/5/2025) (Entered: 06/05/2025)

extracted.value: MOTION to Certify Class filed by Plaintiffs (Neeta Thakur, Ken Alex, Nell Green Nylen, Robert Hirst, Christine Philliou, Jedda Foreman) on 6/5/2025, asking the court to certify the class and appoint class counsel, with responses due 6/20/2025 and replies due 6/27/2025.

evidence.text: Plaintiffs' Motion for Summary Judgment and renewed memorandum in support of class certification, if necessary due by 10/10/2025. Oppositions/Cross-Motion due by 11/7/2025. Reply due by 11/21/2025.

extracted.value: Plaintiffs' Motion for Summary Judgment and renewed memorandum in support of class certification, due by 10/10/2025, filed by Plaintiffs, requesting summary judgment on the merits.
